page.title: 11AN ORDINARY DAY
page.content: My dad rises at 6.00am.He starts work at Meritt and Fryers at 7.30am. and finishes at 5.30pm.As dad has all the office keys he has to be early.One day dad said,"I have never had so many cups of tea in my life.Every time somebody comes in Vicky,my secretary says,'Would you like a cup of tea?'" In the afternoon dad checks up on all the bills he has to pay out for all the goods he buys for the shelves.In the later afternoon he cashes up all the money.In a day Meritt and Fryers take about Â£2500. My dad's work is in the 'Do-it-yourself'store,the timber yard, and builder's yard where there are cement and tiles for building,and a sand and grit yard.
